value.title: How to get Secure Images in Power BI Reports
value.excerpt: Struggling getting images in your Power BI Report? Don't want to use anonymous URLs for the image? Patrick walks you through an approach to use secured images in your reports! You seriously need to watch this if you are using Synapse dedicated SQL Pools.  Performance tuning with materialized views using dedicated

value.title: Is a parameter filtered in Power BI Paginated Reports???
value.excerpt: How do you know if a parameter was filtered in your Power BI Paginated Reports? Was a slicer used in the Power BI report that is using the Paginated visual? value.title: OData Differences within Power BI and how to refresh your data!
value.excerpt: Last week we looked at the O365 Bubble and how we use Authentication to go in and out.  This week we show it in action!  We will look at one of the limitations to the existing Power BI service and how we can actually use the new Power BI Preview service to refresh data from an OData feed using oAuth

value.title: Power BI URL Filter Updates (August 2018)
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick looks at the recent updates to using the Power BI URL Filter. The update to using URL Filter parameters in Power BI include updates to operators along with the ability to use more than strings and spaces in table names! value.title: Power BI User lookup with the gateway using Active Directory

This can be used for both Analysis Services mapping and the Kerberos SSO with DirectQuery connections. value.title: Tooltips, tooltips, tooltips in Power BI

He walks through the DAX measure and also shows some pitfalls to look out for when it comes to filter context.  Go here for the sample DAX statement: https://guyinacube.com/2017/06/tooltips-tooltips-tooltips-power-bi/

value.title: Tracing your DAX queries in Power BI
value.excerpt: Learn how you can trace your DAX queries when trying to troubleshoot or optimize Power BI reports and datasets. There are a few options and Adam walks you through them.  DAX Studio: https://daxstudio.org/  SQL Server Management Studio: https://docs.microsoft.com/sql/ssms/download-sql-server-management-studio-ssms?view=sql-server-ver15
